text: Python/Numpy: Convert list of bools to unsigned int
I have a large m-by-n array of booleans, where each n-element row represents a single low-dimensional hash of a high-dimensional feature vector.
) I would like to know the answer in order to compress my data as much as possible.
Edit: Thank you for the responses!

code:
